content: *k1 with mc k1 with a repeat from * to end shape crown break mc as you work the following shaping change to dpn when there with a knit 3 rnds are too few sts to fit around the circular needle size medium with mc knit 3 rnds decrease round 1 *k10 pm repeat from * to end decrease round 2 *knit to 2 sts before m k2tog slm repeat from * to end 9 sts decreased decrease round 3 knit repeat rnds 2 - 3 two more times 63 sts rem repeat round 2 three more times 36 sts rem next 2 rnds k2tog around 9 sts rem size large round 1 *k11 pm repeat from * to end round 2 *knit to 2 sts before m k2tog slm repeat from * to end 10 sts decreased round 3 knit repeat rnds 2 - 3 three more times 70 sts rem repeat round 2 three more times 40 sts rem next 2 rnds k2tog around 10 sts rem both sizes cut yarn leaving a 12 tail thread tail on tapestry needle draw through rem sts twice and pull snugly to close hole at top of hat fasten_off finishing weave in ends block if desired optional make 3 pompom using remnants of all colors and attach to top of hat dovetail hat in size medium shown in ag21481 mauve mc with agb2600 magenta a agb2193 cactus flower b and agb2419 oceano c all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/8/21 © fairmount fibers ltd 2021 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
